sentences.chinese: 结肠镜检查后该注意什么？

sentences.english: The diagnosis of this lesion was internal hemorrhoids based on sigmoidoscopy.
sentences.chinese: 由乙状结肠镜诊断此病灶为内痔。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the effect of Cisapride on postoperative colonic peristalsis.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察西沙比利对结肠术后肠运动功能的影响。

sentences.english: AIM The colon absorption of pancreatic kininogenase was investigated.
sentences.chinese: 目的考察胰激肽原酶的大鼠结肠吸收。

sentences.english: WHAT ARE THE ADVANTAGES OF LAPAROSCOPIC COLON RESECTION
sentences.chinese: 采用腹腔镜结肠切除术的优点是什么？

sentences.english: A special medical device for the treatment of congenital megacolon is designed.
sentences.chinese: 设计一种用于治疗先天性巨结肠的专用医疗器材。

sentences.english: Sigmoid and transverse colon was the common site of perforation.
sentences.chinese: 穿孔部位常见于乙状结肠和横结肠。

sentences.english: Simple right sigmoid colon needn t to manage.
sentences.chinese: 单纯右位乙状结肠本身不需处理。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the feasibility of first-staged resection and anastomosis for acute left-semicolon obstruction.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨左半结肠急性梗阻一期切除吻合术的可行性。

sentences.english: This colonic mucosal surface is erythematous because of the enormous infestation by Trichuris organisms ( whipworms ).
sentences.chinese: 鞭虫大量侵袭使结肠粘膜表面出现红斑。

sentences.english: In wrap restraint stress rats , both defecation and colon transit increased. Guanylin contents in plasma and colon increased too.
sentences.chinese: 束缚应激大鼠血浆及结肠组织中鸟苷素的含量增加。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the effect and safety of colon polyps treated with endoscope.
sentences.chinese: 目的对内镜下治疗结肠息肉的疗效及安全性进行评价。

sentences.english: For 15 patients with unresectable lesions, colostomy of transverse colon or sigmoid colon was performed.
sentences.chinese: 肿瘤无法切除行乙状结肠或横结肠造瘘15例。
